text: Blinky Palermo (2 June 1943 - 18 February 1977) was a German abstract painter. He was one of the most important German painters of his generation, in a short life. His took inspiration from painters like Kazimir Malevich and Barnett Newman. He died on a trip to the Maldives, when was only 32 years old. ==Related pages== *List of German painters Category:1943 births Category:1977 deaths Category:German painters
title: Blinky Palermo
